question: (1).Seeing Imam Abu hanifa (R.A) in dream (2).TAWAF of Kaaba in Dream
answer:
QUESTION
AOA (1).I saw a dream in which I saw that I am going to Imam Abu Hanifa (R.A) to read from him, and in second scene I saw that I and some other boys are sitting in front of Imam Abu Hanifa (R.A) and reading from him. (2).In another dream I saw that I am doing TAWAF of Kaaba and I am so close to the wall of Kaaba that I am touching it.
ANSWER


Share:
1. The dream is an indication to seek knowledge and understanding of Deen.

2. May Allah Ta?ala make that dream a reality. It also indicates you serving Islam.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
